COSC461.Greed

Interface GreedAgent


  • public interface GreedAgent
    Author:
    Adam J. Conover, D.Sc. <aconover@towson.edu>

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getAgentName()
      The Programmer defined "name" of the agent.
      Direction getMove(GreedGame game)
      When the agent is given a "StateNode" the agent should respond with it's best move given that game state.

    • Method Detail

      • getMove

        Direction getMove(GreedGame game)
        When the agent is given a "StateNode" the agent should respond with it's best move given that game state.
        Parameters:
        game - The Current Game object.
        Returns:
        The direction in which the agent wants to move.

      • getAgentName

        java.lang.String getAgentName()
        The Programmer defined "name" of the agent. It can be any string you like as long as long as it will be recognizable and HOPEFULLY unique.
        Returns:
        The Name of the Agent as defined by it's author.
